• Directions: You have 25 minutes to answer the following question. It is suggested that you take up to 5 minutes of this time to plan and outline your nswer. While a formal essay is not required, it is not enough to answer a question by merely listing facts. Illustrate your answers with substantive geographic examples where appropriate.

Economic restructuring is transforming the world economy.

  1. Define and discuss the key features of the new international division of labor (also known as global division of labor).

  2. Explain an impact of the new international division of labor on the socioeconomic structure of the United States.

  3. Explain an impact of the new international division of labor on the socioeconomic structure of developing countries such as Mexico, China, and India.
